load

public java.sql.ResultSet load()
Grabs every entry in the blocks table.

Returns:
ResultSet containing every KeyBlock in the database.

Delete a KeyBlock record from the database.

Parameters:

dropRecord

Delete a KeyBlock record from the database.

Parameters:
keyblock - keyblock - the block that will be removed from the database.

newRecord

Insert the values from an instance of KeyBlock into a new row in the database.

Parameters:

newRecord

public void newRecord(java.lang.String idstring,
                      java.lang.String world,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int z,
                      java.lang.String user,
                      java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String owner)
Insert a new record into the database with the provided info.

Parameters:
idstring - the idstring
world - The name of the world the KeyBlock is in.
x - The x coordinate of the KeyBlock.
y - The y coordinate of the KeyBlock.
z - The z coordinate of the KeyBlock.
user - A comma seperated list of users who are allowed to use this KeyBlock.
key - The item that must be held to use this KeyBlock.
owner - The name of the player that created this KeyBlock.

updates

private void updates()
Checks to see if the number of open PreparedStatements is greater than or equal to the autosave value set in the configuration file. If it is equal to or greater, then call the saveAll() method and save the 'floating' KeyBlocks to the database.

saveAll

public void saveAll()
Commits all open PreparedStatements.
